data.title: Nice Coffee House!
data.text: Stopped on a Sunday morning and it was very quiet inside.  Staff was very attentive and friendly and the coffee was exceptional!  I do wish they had a couple of food options, there was only a couple of pieces of cake for snacks when we were there.

data.title: Good cappuccino
data.text: We stopped in Billings for a caffeine break on the way to Livingston.  Ordered the cappuccino and was not disappointed.  Foam on the flat side, which I like and the espresso was nutty with a hint of berry.  Worth the stop!

data.title: Great coffee, cool location and vibe
data.text: This was the second time I made a visit to MoAv coffee. Both times I have had good service and great coffee. The inside of the now MoAV coffee has been updated and is a comfortable place to meet with friends, I can see MoAV becoming a community meeting place. I would recommend this place to fellow coffee lovers. There is also a nice patio that  I have heard is pet friendly.

data.title: You MUST go there!
data.text: The coffee is quality, and so are the people! Nice interior. They have both comfortable seating in cushy couches and chairs, and tables and chairs for laptop work. This is a regular coffee shop for me.
